problem_text_cn: 如图,▱ABCD中,点E、F分别在AD、AB上,依次连接EB、EC、FC、FD,图中阴影部分的面积分别为S~1~、S~2~、S~3~、S~4~,已知S~1~=2、S~2~=12、S~3~=3,则S~4~的值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, ▱ABCD, points E and F are on AD and AB respectively, and connect EB, EC, FC, and FD in turn. The area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is S~ 1 ~, S~ 2 ~, S~ 3 ~ , S~ 4 ~, S~ 1 ~ = N_0, S~ 2 ~ = N_1, S~ 3 ~ = N_2, then the value of S~ 4 ~ is ()
raw_answer: 解:设平行四边形的面积为S,则S~△CBE~=S~△CDF~=\frac{1}{2}S,由图形可知,△CDF面积+△CBE面积+(S~1~+S~4~+S~3~)-S~2~=平行四边形ABCD的面积∴S=S~△CBE~+S~△CDF~+2+S~4~+3-12,即S=\frac{1}{2}S+\frac{1}{2}S+2+S~4~+3-12,解得S~4~=7,故选:D．
